name: Little World's Story
description:
In this click puzzle game, you will experience 8 small stories, 8 small worlds with different world views, or warmth, or darkness, or...While solving the puzzle, you will also feel different situations.
In the dark days when there is no light, in the days when hope and despair coexist, how should we choose
Legend shines into reality and is doomed to fate. How should we straighten out our mentality
Human nature makes people desperate, but it also has warmth.
If the house is gone, can we make a decisive decision. As long as the family is safe, why not be home all over the world!
Maybe we don't understand each other's situation, but we can try to communicate. Light and darkness are optional.
Life is short, why not live in the present!
What's the meaning of existence when human beings compete for land and meet their desires without restraint!!!
As a producer, there are times of frustration. The original intention of making the game also hopes to inspire you in this world with a short story with philosophy. In this sunny and dark day, I hope we can all forge ahead. Never give up!
Update stories irregularly.
Maybe life is hard, but I wish you happiness!
